mapper.insert: insert into skills( id, year, level, referTagId, referUserId, createdAt, updatedAt, isDeleted ) values( #{id}, #{referTagId}, #{year}, #{level}, #{referUserId}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt}, false )
mapper.update: update skills set referTagId = #{referTagId}, year = #{year}, level = #{level}, updated_at = #{updatedAt}, where id = #{id}
update skills set updated_at = #{updatedAt}, isDelete = true, where id = #{id}
